title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin gives his takeaway from the Saints loss to the Cowboys and why it's time for Sean Payton to admit the harsh truth about his quarterback situation. He stands by Brian Kelly and explains why he will be successful at LSU after he receives criticism for a viral video of his introduction to the university fans at a basketball game. Colin gives his Blazing 5 picks for week 13 of the NFL season. Plus, Packers TE Marcedes Lewis joins the show in studio to talk about what it's like to be teammates with Aaron Rodgers. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
